content: <!-- RSS generated by The Office of Senator Christopher Coons on {ts '2015-03-04 14:47:26'} --> <rss version="2.0"> <channel> <title>Senator Christopher Coons Press Feed</title> <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/rss/feeds/</link> <description>Feed from the website of Senator Christopher Coons</description> <language>en-us</language> <copyright>Copyright 2015</copyright> <docs>http://www.coons.senate.gov/rss/feeds/</docs> <lastBuildDate>Wed, 04 Mar 2015 14:47:26 EST</lastBuildDate> <ttl>1</ttl> <skipDays>   <day>Saturday</day>   <day>Sunday</day> </skipDays> <skipHours>   <hour>1</hour>   <hour>2</hour>   <hour>3</hour>   <hour>4</hour>   <hour>5</hour> </skipHours>              <item>    <title>Carper, Coons, Carney will host three job fairs this spring</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/carper-coons-carney-will-host-three-job-fairs-this-spring</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 04 Mar 2015 13:26:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WILMINGTON, Del. &ndash; Working to connect individuals searching for jobs and assisting companies looking to fill full and part time positions, U.S. Senators Tom Carper and Chris Coons, and U.S. Representative John Carney today announced the dates of three job fairs this spring:  Monday, March 23...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/carper-coons-carney-will-host-three-job-fairs-this-spring</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons re-introduces bipartisan bill to strengthen parent-school partnerships</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-re-introduces-bipartisan-bill-to-strengthen-parent-school-partnerships</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 04 Mar 2015 08:48:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; With the support of the Delaware PTA, U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) has re-introduced the bipartisan Family Engagement in Education Act, aimed at helping schools and families work together to support learning and raise student achievement.&nbsp; The legislation, which was...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-re-introduces-bipartisan-bill-to-strengthen-parent-school-partnerships</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Statement of Senator Coons on address by Prime Minister Netanyahu</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/statement-of-senator-coons-on-address-by-prime-minister-netanyahu</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Tue, 03 Mar 2015 15:35:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.), a member of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, issued the following statement Tuesday following the address by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu before a joint meeting of Congress:&nbsp; &ldquo;Prime Minister Netanyahu delivered a strong...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/statement-of-senator-coons-on-address-by-prime-minister-netanyahu</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Coons, Durbin, Hirono introduce patent reform bill to protect innovation, confront abuse</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/coons-durbin-hirono-introduce-patent-reform-bill-to-protect-innovation-confront-abuse</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Tue, 03 Mar 2015 07:00:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senators Chris Coons (D-Del.) and Dick Durbin (D-Ill.), members of the Senate Judiciary Committee, and Mazie Hirono (D-Hawaii), member of the Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship, will introduce legislation on Tuesday to strengthen America&rsquo;s patent system and targ...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/coons-durbin-hirono-introduce-patent-reform-bill-to-protect-innovation-confront-abuse</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons urges Supreme Court to empower Americans to end partisan gerrymandering</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-urges-supreme-court-to-empower-americans-to-end-partisan-gerrymandering</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Mon, 02 Mar 2015 15:51:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.), a member of the Senate Judiciary Committee, sharply criticized the rampant gerrymandering that is rigging our democracy, as the Supreme Court heard oral arguments on Monday in the case of Arizona State Legislature v...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-urges-supreme-court-to-empower-americans-to-end-partisan-gerrymandering</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons praises new trade agreement with east African nations</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-praises-new-trade-agreement-with-east-african-nations</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Fri, 27 Feb 2015 17:01:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) on Friday praised the Obama Administration&rsquo;s new trade cooperation agreement with the five nations of the East African Community (EAC) &ndash; Burundi, Keny...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-praises-new-trade-agreement-with-east-african-nations</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>United States Senate condemns vicious attacks by Boko Haram, urges credible and transparent elections in Nigeria</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-condemns-vicious-attacks-by-boko-haram-urges-credible-and-transparent-elections-in-nigeria</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Thu, 26 Feb 2015 10:56:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; The United States Senate this week voted unanimously to condemn the vicious attacks perpetrated by Boko Haram against innocent civilians, especially women and children, and called on Nigeria&rsquo;s government to ensure its upcoming national elections on March 28 and April 11 are safe, credibl...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-condemns-vicious-attacks-by-boko-haram-urges-credible-and-transparent-elections-in-nigeria</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Floor Speech: Senator Coons urges Republicans to fund Department of Homeland Security</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/statements_and_speeches/in-floor-speech-senator-coons-urges-republicans-to-fund-department-of-homeland-security</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Tue, 24 Feb 2015 11:25:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>Mr. President, I have come to the floor this evening to speak about the impending shutdown this week of the federal Department of Homeland Security. At a time when the folks I hear from in Delaware, and I suspect what all of the members in this chamber are hearing, as we return from a week spent in our home stat...</description>    <guid>newsroom/statements_and_speeches/in-floor-speech-senator-coons-urges-republicans-to-fund-department-of-homeland-security</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>United States Senate honors Lunar New Year</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-honors-lunar-new-year</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 18 Feb 2015 16:33:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; The United States Senate has unanimously approved a resolution recognizing the cultural and historical significance of the Lunar New Year, which begins Thursday, to the Asian American community. U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) introduced the resolution with Senators John Cornyn (R-Texas), Ma...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-honors-lunar-new-year</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons reintroduces bipartisan bill to reform and modernize America&#x2019;s food aid program</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bipartisan-bill-to-reform-and-modernize-americas-food-aid-program</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Fri, 13 Feb 2015 09:19:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senators Chris Coons (D-Del.) and Bob Corker (R-Tenn.), both members of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, have reintroduced bipartisan legislation (S.525) to reform U.S. global food assistance programs that will free up as much as $440 million annually through greater efficiencies i...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bipartisan-bill-to-reform-and-modernize-americas-food-aid-program</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons reintroduces bill to protect Americans&#x2019; electronic data stored abroad</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bill-to-protect-americans-electronic-data-stored-abroad</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Thu, 12 Feb 2015 13:13:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) joined with Senators Orrin Hatch (R-Utah) and Dean Heller (R-Nev.) today to reintroduce the bipartisan Law Enforcement Access to Data Stored Abroad (&ldquo;LEADS&rdquo;) Act, which will reform the Electronic Communications Privacy Act (ECPA) to promote interna...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bill-to-protect-americans-electronic-data-stored-abroad</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>President Obama announces change in U.S. Ebola strategy mirroring Senator Coons&#x2019; call</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/president-obama-announces-change-in-us-ebola-strategy-mirroring-senator-coons-call</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 11 Feb 2015 16:01:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; After a four-day trip to Liberia in late December, U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) &mdash; then chair of the Senate Foreign Relations Subcommittee on African Affairs &mdash; urged the Pentagon to change its strategy in the fight against Ebola. In an event at the White House on Wed...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/president-obama-announces-change-in-us-ebola-strategy-mirroring-senator-coons-call</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons praises Administration plan to combat wildlife trafficking</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-praises-administration-plan-to-combat-wildlife-trafficking</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 11 Feb 2015 15:54:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.), former chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Subcommittee on African Affairs, praised the Administration&rsquo;s just-released plan to implement its National Strategy on Wildlife Trafficking. <a href="http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/s...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-praises-administration-plan-to-combat-wildlife-trafficking</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Statement of Senator Coons on the Administration&#x2019;s authorization for the use of military force against ISIL</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/statement-of-senator-coons-on-the-administrations-authorization-for-the-use-of-military-force-against-isil</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 11 Feb 2015 09:46:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.), a member of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, issued the following statement on Wednesday on the Administration&rsquo;s proposed authorization for the use of military force (AUMF) against the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).&nbsp; &l...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/statement-of-senator-coons-on-the-administrations-authorization-for-the-use-of-military-force-against-isil</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senators Coons, Merkley introduce bill to expand ACA small business tax credit</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senators-coons-merkley-introduce-bill-to-expand-aca-small-business-tax-credit</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Thu, 05 Feb 2015 13:05:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senators Chris Coons (D-Del.) and Jeff Merkley (D-Ore.) introduced legislation on Thursday to help small business owners who want to provide health insurance to their workers. The Small Business Tax Credit Accessibility Act would expand and simplify the Affordable Care Act&rsquo;s...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senators-coons-merkley-introduce-bill-to-expand-aca-small-business-tax-credit</guid>   </item>    </channel> </rss>
